About

Taewook Kim is a Ph.D. student in the Dept. of CSE at HKUST. He is advised by Prof. Xiaojuan Ma as a member of the HCI Initiative. He earned his B.S. from Hanyang University on February 2018.

His research in Human-Computer Interaction focuses on Positive Computing and Affective Computing. He is interested in building interactive systems that abate users' stresses and tensions in their everyday lives.



Publication

Mediating Color Filter Exploration with Color Theme Semantics Derived from Social Curation Data
Ziming Wu, Zhida Sun, Taewook Kim, Manuele Reani, Caroline Jay, and Xiaojuan Ma
CSCW 2018 | acm dl | ref
